name: Blog site
description: Contains a list page, detail pages, and a contact form. Includes email provider integration.

stories.name: Sidebar
stories.description: Owner profile image, site name, tag line, and site navigation organized inside the left sidebar
requirements: Owner profile image, site name, tag line, and site navigation appear in the left sidebar on all pages of the site
For blog list and contact me pages the corresponding site navigation has the arrow icon pointing to it

stories.name: Blog list frontend
requirements: Three blog posts are displayed per page
The active page is underlined in the list pagination
Clicking on a different page navigates the user to that page

stories.name: Blog details frontend
requirements: If the user clicks on a blog post from the blog list they are navigated to that blogs details page
The url pattern for detail pages should be base-usl/:id with :id being the id of the blog post
Blog post data should be retained from the list page when navigating to the detail page from the list
When the details page is accessed not from the list page (ie. directly) the blog data should be retrieved from the API
Back to list button takes the user back to the blog list page

stories.name: Contact me frontend
stories.description: Form allowing users to email the site owner
requirements: Clicking the SEND button sends the form data to the API
Validations on form data are: subject and message are required, subject max length is 100 characters, message max length is 450 characters
Display helpful error messages to the user if they attempt to submit the form with errors

stories.name: Mobile design
stories.description: On mobile devices the site follows the pattern shown in the attached resource
requirements: The active site navigations should be underlined when on the blog list or contact me pages

stories.name: Blog list backend
stories.description: GET API endpoint that returns all blog posts

stories.name: Blog details backend
stories.description: GET API endpoint that returns an individual blog post given a blog id
requirements: For a given blog id returns the one corresponding blog post

stories.name: Contact me backend
stories.description: POST API endpoint that accepts form data and sends the site owner an email containing the form data utilizing an email provider
requirements: Accepts form data from the Contact me frontend page
Validates form data using the same validation as the Contact me frontend story
Utilizes an email provider to send the site owner (yourself in this case) an email containing the form data
